name: CreateCheckitemOnTrelloChecklist
description:
Add a checkitem to a specific Trello checklist.

Use this tool to add a new checkitem to an existing checklist on Trello by specifying the checklist ID.

parameters.name: checkitem_name
parameters.description: The name of the new checkitem for the checklist, with a length between 1 and 16384 characters.

value_schema.description: The name of the new check item on the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

parameters.name: checkitem_position
parameters.description: The position of the check item in the checklist. Accepts 'top', 'bottom', or a positive number to specify position.

value_schema.description: The position of the check item in the checklist. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

parameters.name: due_date_for_checkitem
parameters.description: Specify the due date for the checkitem in ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: A due date for the checkitem

parameters.name: due_reminder_minutes_before_due
parameters.description: The number of minutes before the due date when a reminder should be sent for the checkitem.

value_schema.description: A dueReminder for the due date on the checkitem

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: The ID of a Trello member to assign to the checkitem.

value_schema.description: An ID of a member resource.

parameters.name: is_item_checked
parameters.description: Indicate if the check item should be marked as checked upon creation. Accepts a boolean value.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the check item is already checked when created.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new check item on the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

value_schema.description: The name of the new check item on the checklist. Should be a string of length 1 to 16384.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The position of the check item in the checklist. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

value_schema.description: The position of the check item in the checklist. One of: `top`, `bottom`, or a positive number.

parameters.name: checked
parameters.description: Determines whether the check item is already checked when created.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the check item is already checked when created.

parameters.name: due
parameters.description: A due date for the checkitem

value_schema.description: A due date for the checkitem

parameters.name: dueReminder
parameters.description: A dueReminder for the due date on the checkitem

value_schema.description: A dueReminder for the due date on the checkitem

parameters.name: idMember
parameters.description: An ID of a member resource.

value_schema.description: An ID of a member resource.
